meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels are clearly 02271.8, which is 2271.8 m³. The red needle is positioned between 0.01 and 0.02. Based on visual estimation and angular interpolation, it appears closer to 0.01 (approximately 1/3 of the way between 0.01 and 0.02). The '0,00' mark is at ~11 o'clock and the needle is at ~2 o'clock, making the angle roughly 90 degrees clockwise from the '0,00' mark.
